item.title: Blog post fetcher with React + hitting GraphQL endpoint
item.description: This post provides the building blocks (like Lego) to help you build something similar. You can click here to view the code and here for the demo. The idea I have been a user of Matters (a mainly Mandarin blogging platform) for a while now. The user home page design fits about three articles. This results in an “infinite scroll hell” homepage for users who has many articles. Their contents will sink to the bottom and never see the sunlight.
